## GenerativeDirectAnswerDisplay() function

Displays the AI generated answer of a generative direct answer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function GenerativeDirectAnswerDisplay<T>({ customCssClasses }: GenerativeDirectAnswerDisplayProps<T>): JSX.Element | null;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

**Returns:**

JSX.Element \| null

A React element for the generative direct answer display, or null if there is no generated answer
